title: Tom Felton joins Kate Mara in indie war hero drama
text:
"Harry Potter" actor Tom Felton is joining Kate Mara in an untitled indie drama focusing on the true story of Iraq War hero Megan Leavey.
READ: Tom Felton's Against The Sun all set to release on March 6, 2015
Gabriela Cowperthwaite, the helmer behind the documentary Blackfish , is directing the drama that centres on Leavey, a Marine in a K9 bomb sniffing unit in Iraq, and the bond with her dog, Rex, said The Hollywood Reporter.
They served two six-month tours and undertook over 100 missions before a detonation wounded them both.
Mara, 32, is playing the Marine, while Edie Falco is on board to play her mother. 28-year-old Felton, best known for playing Draco Malfoy in the Harry Potter film series, will play a veteran dog handler.
The film will shoot in Spain, South Carolina and New York.
